text:
="preserve">Penelope Pussycat is an animated cartoon cat shown in the Warner Bros. classic "Looney Tunes". She is usually a non-speaker, though she meows and purrs. She was often called Penelope, Fifi, Fabrette and Le Cat. The name "Penelope Pussycat" was created under Warner Bros. for marketing.
Penelope first appeared in the 1949 animated short "Scent-imental Reasons". That movie got an Academy Award.
Her first speaking role was "Carrotblanca", a 1995 animated short movie.
